column4: i installed google earth now i am trying to uninstall it, but i really cant, any help?
how can i remove google earth?
how can i remove google earth's app?
there is any way i can remove google earth's application?
did you do a manual install, or through the package manager?
your best bet might be to go through the steps of reinstalling it, and then just remove the files that it moves around.  Sometimes its hard to trace where they go
you mean trace the package while i am installing it?
right, maybe run it like ``$# make install >> install.log''  so you can find the files later
ok thx, i'll give it a shot?
ok thx, i'll give it a shot***
btw google earth doesnt has to come with an uninstaller package?
I really dont know.  I run a machine with no xserver to conserver battery life ;)
